While vaccination is now our most important and effective measure, there will continue to be a need for some measures and a layered approach to the application of these measures to reduce the risk of transmission.
In preparation for the #reopening of our night club sector on Oct 22, a pilot night club event will take place in September.

Although public health must come first, current measures are devastating for our live entertainment sector, and indeed for everyone who misses attending live shows.   Reopening this sector is my number 1 priority.  https://t.co/aaaRyIubRB

Throughout August I'll work with my Government colleagues to define a path to reopening the live entertainment sector.  I've engaged with and listened to the sector and I understand how distressing this extended period of inactivity has been.

I'm currently working with my Cabinet colleagues to provide certainty for the live entertainment sector  I've written to Minister @DonnellyStephen & the Expert Working Group on Rapid Testing to establish if the Digital Covid Cert and if testing can play a role in reopening
I have also extended the deadline for using the Live Performance Support Scheme to the end of October

ğŸ§µ Today I'm announcing a new strand of funding for the Music and Entertainment Business Assistance Scheme for businesses with turnovers of between â‚¬15k - â‚¬20k.   Applications will open in August
